bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of huo luan 霍亂 , cholera, including abdominal fullness with twisting pain, shortness of breath, and mental confusion in the absence of vomiting and diarrhea. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 22: 但腹滿，煩亂，絞痛，短氣，其腸胃先挾實，故不吐 痢，名為乾霍亂也 , “If one suffers only from abdominal fullness, mental confusion, twisting pain, and shortness of qi, intestines and stomach cling to their matter. Hence there is neither vomiting nor free-flux illness. This is called dry cholera ”.
